Tenzin Education Consultancy & Placement Firm

One of the direct Authorised Agents of Edith Cowan University, Murdoch University and Curtin University in Perth, Western Australia

Offer Letter within 21 days and COE in 14 days

Our Mission

Our mission is to become one of the leading Education and Consultancy Firm in Bhutan by assisting Bhutanese students in their search for better education programs in abroad to build their career opportunities through professional, practical and positive learning experiences and creating opportunities through lifelong learning.

Our Vision

Our vision is to become one of the best choices of education consultancy and placement firm in Bhutan for every student who aspires to study abroad.

Our vision reflects our values, integrity and commitment to provide best services. Established Linkages in Australia: Tenzin Education Consultancy and Placement firm represent well established University’s in Perth Western Australia – National Institute of Technology Australia and Australian Technical College, they are accredited by Australian government bodies to deliver IT and Business courses with proper CRICOS. For more information, I am attaching the certificate of representation issued in my name and the web links for the said providers.

Our Partner Insitutions

About Us

Tenzin Education Consultancy and Placement Firm (ECPF) is a registered Education Consultancy and Placement Firm under the Department of Adult and Higher Education, Ministry of Education, Bhutan.

We have been in operation since 2017 and have been offering reliable and integrated services solutions to the prospective students of Bhutan who wishes to pursue their further studies in Australia. Our office is managed by well trained and Certified Education Counsellors, and helpful staff to assist prospective students with their enrolment and visa processing. Since inception, we have been a successful agent which we were able to help more than a hundred students to enrol in various study fields in Australia.

At Tenzin ECPF, students are more than just a collection of business transactions. Once a student comes on board as a registered client, they become part of our family, and utmost importance is placed in attending to their every individual need. This reciprocity is clearly demonstrated by our loyal students who in turn recommend our services to their family and friends.
